title: Add Website schema
body: Implement JSON-LD Website structured data on the homepage to improve search engine understanding of the site and brand.

title: Add LocalBusiness schema
body: Include LocalBusiness structured data for Impact Orbit Creative Group to enhance local search visibility and Google Maps results.

title: Add Event schema for Space Impact Forum
body: Add JSON-LD Event schema for all conference dates and sessions to improve rich result display in search engines.

title: Add Person/Professional schema for speakers
body: Include structured data for all speakers using Person or Professional schema to improve visibility in knowledge panels.

title: Add FAQPage schema for FAQ page
body: Implement FAQPage schema to enable rich results for frequently asked questions about the event.

title: Add Breadcrumb schema
body: Implement breadcrumb structured data on all pages to enhance search engine results and improve site navigation display.

title: Add Article schema for white papers and research library
body: Use Article or ScholarlyArticle schema for white papers and research library pages to improve SEO and indexing of content.

title: Add CreativeWork schema for event recordings
body: Include CreativeWork structured data for past event recordings so they can appear in search engines with rich results.

title: Add Organization schema
body: Add Organization structured data for Impact Orbit Creative Group to clarify official entity information for search engines.

title: Add Open Graph and Twitter Card metadata
body: Include Open Graph and Twitter Card metadata on all pages to improve social sharing previews and engagement.

title: Optimize meta titles and descriptions
body: Review and update meta titles and descriptions for all pages to improve SEO, click-through rate, and keyword relevance.

title: Implement canonical URLs
body: Ensure every page has a canonical URL to avoid duplicate content issues and consolidate SEO value.

title: Improve heading structure (H1-H6)
body: Review all pages and ensure proper H1-H6 hierarchy for better SEO and accessibility.

title: Add schema for Media & Press page
body: Use NewsArticle or PressRelease schema for press releases and media content to improve indexing.

title: Add schema for Sponsorship page
body: Include structured data for Sponsorship opportunities and kit to make it discoverable in search engines.
